caption: A woman is getting married. She is wearing a purple and gold outfit. She is getting married to a man. The man is wearing a pink outfit. The woman is wearing a headpiece. The woman is getting married in a white flower.

The scene is from an Indian movie. It shows a group of warriors in battle attire, wearing helmets and armor. They are in a battle scene, with a cloudy sky in the background. The warriors are holding weapons and appear to be in the middle of a battle.
Two women are standing in front of a building. The woman on the left is wearing a red headscarf and a pink dress. The woman on the right is wearing a gold necklace and a purple and gold dress.
A large group of people are walking through a valley.
A group of soldiers are standing in a line, holding torches. They are wearing traditional Indian military uniforms. In the background, there is a row of cannons. The sky is dark and cloudy.

This is a scene from a movie. In the foreground, there is a group of men wearing helmets and chainmail shirts. In the background, there is a warrior wearing a brown tunic and a chainmail shirt. The warrior is holding a sword and is standing in front of a group of men who are also wearing helmets and chainmail shirts. The men are holding flags. The setting appears to be a battlefield.

This is a scene from an Indian movie. The scene is set in a large hall with a chandelier hanging from the ceiling. There are many men in the scene, all wearing traditional Indian attire. The men are wearing turbans and are engaged in a physical activity, possibly a dance or a fight. The men are wearing white pants and are wearing black tops. The scene is very dynamic and the men are moving quickly. The setting is very traditional and the men are dressed in traditional Indian attire.
